name: Invisible Horde
description:
This facility is full of invisible monsters. Can you find the exit and get out of here alive?

Use your flashlight to reveal the monsters. Your pistol will help you deal with them.

Controls:

W/D - Move

E - Interact

R - Reload

Mouse - Target

LMB - Shoot

Esc - Pause
